author: m.kalinin
content: What's the logic that client implementations apply to attestations from a block which state transition is invalid? Do implementations call `on_attestation` regardless of the block validity or not?

author: potuz
content: You can't, you can only call on_attestation to blocks that are in forkchoice

author: potuz
content: And you won't have a block in forkchoice if it didn't pass state transition
